name: SlenderBeanGus
description:
PLEASE BE AWARE, THIS GAME IS NOT FUNCTIONAL ON ITS OWN, IT IS MERELY A CLIENT AT THE MOMENT ONCE AT LEAST ONE MAP IS DESIGNED AND THE BASE MECHANICS ARE FUNCTIONAL I WILL RELEASE SERVER FILES. THIS CURRENTLY EXISTS AS A WAY TO SHARE WITH PLAYTESTERS.

This is a stupid game that was more pain then it was worth. the idea came about when my great(not so great) friend asked me to make a game based on SlenderGus and lolbeans.io(both known for their stupidity and multiplayer dumbshit potentional) so I did the only logical thing and started working on it(why did you do this to my BSS)

and so I present SlenderBeanGus.

Credit where credit is due:

BlueStopSign - Monster Concept design and textures

Tom Weiland - Multiplayer Networking

my mate Archie - Screeching monster audio
